# The `HexagonInstPrinter` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

Prints bundles as a newline separated list of individual instructions Duplexes are separated by a vertical tab \\v character A trailing line includes bundle properties such as endloop0/1. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>class llvm::HexagonInstPrinter</CodeBlock>

## Description {#details}

Prints bundles as a newline separated list of individual instructions Duplexes are separated by a vertical tab \\v character A trailing line includes bundle properties such as endloop0/1.

r0 = add(r1, r2) r0 = #0 \\v jump 0x0 :endloop0 :endloop1

Definition at line 25 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/hexagon/lib/target/hexagon/mctargetdesc/hexagoninstprinter-h">HexagonInstPrinter.h</a>.

### printInst() {#aa26f3ffae0b86b636abd35ddeda5d523}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void HexagonInstPrinter::printInst (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcinst">MCInst</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> &#42; MI, uint64&#95;t Address, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> Annot, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcsubtargetinfo">MCSubtargetInfo</a> &amp; STI, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-ostream">raw&#95;ostream</a> &amp; OS)</>}
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
Print the specified <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcinst">MCInst</a> to the specified <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-ostream">raw&#95;ostream</a>.

<code>Address</code> the address of current instruction on most targets, used to print a PC relative immediate as the target address. On targets where a PC relative immediate is relative to the next instruction and the length of a <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcinst">MCInst</a> is difficult to measure (e.g. x86), this is the address of the next instruction. If Address is 0, the immediate will be printed.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/hexagon/lib/target/hexagon/mctargetdesc/hexagoninstprinter-h/#l00031">31</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/hexagon/lib/target/hexagon/mctargetdesc/hexagoninstprinter-h">HexagonInstPrinter.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/hexagon/lib/target/hexagon/mctargetdesc/hexagoninstprinter-cpp/#l00033">33</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/hexagon/lib/target/hexagon/mctargetdesc/hexagoninstprinter-cpp">HexagonInstPrinter.cpp</a>.
